pageContext.claim: “Roger Stone was not involved in my campaign in any way -- other than the very, very beginning, before I -- I think, I -- long before I announced -- a little bit.”
pageContext.analysis: False. Stone was one of Trump's closest political advisers for years and remained in contact with the Trump campaign well into 2016, according to the special counsel's report on Russian election interference. Stone was convicted of lying to investigators, witness tampering and obstructing congressional investigations into Trump. "I spoke by telephone with Roger Stone from time to time during the campaign," Trump said in written answers to the special counsel. "I have no recollection of the specifics of any conversations I had with Mr. Stone between June 1, 2016 and November 8, 2016."
